headline: The Trade Desk (TTD): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: The Trade Desk’s stock price has taken a beating over the past six months, shedding 47.4% of its value and falling to $56.86 per share. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
